newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine deputies prepare to vote on C.Bank head.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine deputies prepare to vote on C.Bank head.

text.p: Ukrainian deputies were preparing to hold a secret ballot on re-appointing reformer Viktor Yushchenko as head of the former Soviet republic's central bank on Wednesday.
The chamber voted down a proposal from speaker Olexander Moroz to vote electronically, instead choosing a secret written ballot to be held between midday (1000 GMT) and 12.30 p.m. (1030 GMT).

President Leonid Kuchma has urged parliament to award a second term to Yushchenko, who is currently acting head of the bank and has won respect in the West as a strong advocate of tight monetary policy.
